name: datathon
description: The goal of our project this weekend was to analyze the effect of COVID-19 on inbound traffic crossings between the U.S.-Canada and the U.S.-Mexico border. We wanted to analyze the efficiency and volume of traffic at each entry port, looking for various factors affecting long wait times. Additionally, we wanted to provide a solution for our peers and fellow travelers to efficiently plan vacations across the border without dealing with unforeseen wait times.
